data.comment: Today's referee, Massimiliano Irrati, has blown to start the match.
Free kick Verona.
In the minute 2, Verona are pushing forward but Federico Dimarco's finish is wide of the goal.
Massimiliano Irrati awards Genoa a goal kick.
In Genoa a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 4, Corner awarded to Genoa.
Throw-in for Genoa in the half of Verona.
Massimiliano Irrati awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 5, Genoa awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Verona in their own half.
Antonio Sanabria (Genoa) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 7, Massimiliano Irrati signals a free kick to Genoa in their own half.
Massimiliano Irrati signals a Genoa throw-in in Verona's half.
Throw-in for Genoa in their own half.
In the minute 13, Genoa move into a 1-0 lead through a Antonio Sanabria header.
That's a fine assist from Lukas Lerager.
Verona have been awarded a corner by Massimiliano Irrati.
In the minute 19, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Can Verona get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Genoa's half?
Can Verona capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Genoa's half?
In the minute 21, Play has been interrupted briefly in Genoa to check on Domenico Criscito, who is grimacing with pain.
Domenico Criscito is back on the pitch.
Verona to take a throw-in in Genoa territory.
Massimiliano Irrati signals a free kick to Genoa.
In the minute 23, The home team has substituted Domenico Criscito with Antonio Barreca. Davide Nicola is thus making his first change.
Corner awarded to Genoa.
It's now 2-0 in Genoa as Antonio Sanabria scores for Genoa.
In the minute 25, Goran Pandev instrumental with a fine assist.
Massimiliano Irrati signals a throw-in for Verona, close to Genoa's area.
In the minute 27, Throw-in Genoa.
Can Verona get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Genoa's half?
Ball goes out of play for a Genoa goal kick.
In the minute 32, Ball safe as Verona is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Massimiliano Irrati signals a Verona throw-in in Genoa's half.
Verona awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 33, Verona push upfield but Massimiliano Irrati quickly pulls them for offside.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Federico Dimarco (Verona) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 36, Verona have been awarded a corner by Massimiliano Irrati.
Throw-in for Verona in the half of Genoa.
Throw-in for Genoa at Luigi Ferraris.
In the minute 38, Genoa to take a throw-in in Verona territory.
Verona needs to be cautious. Genoa have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in for Genoa close to the penalty box.
In the minute 40, In Genoa, Amir Rrahmani of Verona is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Free kick for Verona in the half of Genoa.
Goal kick for Genoa at Luigi Ferraris.
In the minute 42, Goran Pandev of Genoa smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Can Genoa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Verona's half?
Corner awarded to Genoa.
In the minute 44, Goal! Genoa extend their lead to 3-0 thanks to a Cristian Romero header.
Great play from Filip Jagiello to set up the goal.
The 1st half is prolonged by 4 minutes of added time.
In the minute 45, It's a goal kick for the home team in Genoa.
Ball safe as Verona is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Genoa a free kick has been awarded the away team.
The first-half is over.
In the minute 45, Cristian Romero (Genoa) has received a yellow card from Massimiliano Irrati.
The second-half is underway at Luigi Ferraris.
Genoa have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 46, Fabio Borini is replacing Matteo Pessina for Verona at Luigi Ferraris.
Giampaolo Pazzini is on a sub for Samuel Di Carmine for Verona.
In the minute 46, The match at Luigi Ferraris has been interrupted briefly for a check on Matteo Pessina, who is down injured.
Free kick Genoa.
In the minute 48, Throw-in Genoa.
Massimiliano Irrati signals a free kick to Verona.
Andrea Masiello (Genoa) has received a first yellow card.
Genoa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 50, Massimiliano Irrati signals a Genoa throw-in in Verona's half.
Free kick for Verona in the half of Genoa.
Massimiliano Irrati awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 53, Throw-in for Genoa at Luigi Ferraris.
Free kick for Verona in the half of Genoa.
Throw-in high up the field for Verona in Genoa.
In the minute 55, In Genoa, Verona push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Massimiliano Irrati signals a free kick to Genoa in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 57, Throw-in for Verona in their own half.
Verona drive upfield and Giampaolo Pazzini gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Genoa defender.
Genoa have a goal kick.
Verona's Darko Lazovic misses with an attempt on goal.
Massimiliano Irrati awards Genoa a goal kick.
In the minute 61, Free kick Verona.
In the minute 61, Cristian Romero has been booked for the second time in this match - the red card is coming out!
Important block from the Genoa defence as Federico Dimarco fires in a strike for Verona.
Verona are coming forward and Miguel Veloso gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 63, Genoa have a goal kick.
Davide Nicola (Genoa) is making a second substitution, with Edoardo Goldaniga replacing Antonio Sanabria.
Verona have been awarded a corner by Massimiliano Irrati.
In the minute 65, Koray Gunter (Verona) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Verona have been awarded a corner by Massimiliano Irrati.
Fabio Borini (Verona) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
In the minute 67, It's a goal kick for the home team in Genoa.
Genoa awarded a free kick in their own half.
Verona awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 70, Ball safe as Genoa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Corner awarded to Verona.
Verona's Federico Dimarco gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 73, Ball goes out of play for a Genoa goal kick.
Throw-in for Verona in their own half.
In the minute 75, Corner awarded to Verona.
Throw-in Genoa.
Ivan Juric is making the team's third substitution at Luigi Ferraris with Eddie Salcedo replacing Koray Gunter.
Verona have been awarded a corner by Massimiliano Irrati.
In the minute 78, Goal kick for Genoa at Luigi Ferraris.
Miguel Veloso (Verona) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Verona have been awarded a corner by Massimiliano Irrati.
In the minute 79, In Genoa, Eddie Salcedo (Verona) misses the target with a header.
Massimiliano Irrati awards Genoa a goal kick.
Massimiliano Irrati signals a throw-in for Verona, close to Genoa's area.
In the minute 81, Free kick for Genoa in their own half.
Massimiliano Irrati awards the away team a throw-in.
Goal kick for Genoa at Luigi Ferraris.
In the minute 82, The home team have replaced Goran Pandev with Andrea Pinamonti. This is the third substitution made today by Davide Nicola.
Davide Nicola is making the team's fourth substitution at Luigi Ferraris with Francesco Cassata replacing Filip Jagiello.
Throw-in for Verona close to the penalty box.
In the minute 84, Genoa have a goal kick.
Ball goes out of play for a Verona goal kick.
Corner awarded to Verona.
In the minute 87, Massimiliano Irrati signals a free kick to Genoa in their own half.
Amir Rrahmani of Verona gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Genoa.
In the minute 89, Free kick for Genoa in their own half.
Massimiliano Irrati signals a free kick to Genoa.
Genoa have been awarded a corner by Massimiliano Irrati.
5 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Verona awarded a free kick in their own half.
Verona drives forward and Davide Faraoni gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Fabio Borini (Verona) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Verona have a dangerous throw-in.
Can Verona capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Genoa's half?
Genoa have a goal kick.
Verona surge into the attack at Luigi Ferraris but Giampaolo Pazzini’s header is off-target.
Goal kick for Genoa at Luigi Ferraris.
Verona's Amir Rrahmani breaks free at Luigi Ferraris. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Genoa.
That's full-time at Luigi Ferraris. The final score is 3-0.
Francesco Cassata (Genoa) has been shown a straight red card by referee Massimiliano Irrati.
Sofyan Amrabat (Verona) is red-carded and dismissed.
